1: <pb/>Is k'anej cham Salomón, c'ajol David reyal Israel.
2: <pb/><t>Max tz'ibelaycanok, yet watx' chi al-lay el jelanilal, c'al cuybanilej, chi colwaji, yet watx' chi nachaj el juj juntzan k'anej tol ay wal yelapnok.</t>
3: <t>Yuj xan chi je' co beybalnen jelanilal, watx'ilal, tojolal, c'al bay ijanilal.</t>
4: <t>Yochwan cham Salomón tol chi aj can is nabal eb ach'ej tol c'am is nabal, tol chi ak'lay yojtaknej el eb, c'al yilontek ba eb.</t>
5: <t>Yabokab eb aj nabal, yet watx' chi aj can yojtaknen eb; yabokab eb jelan, yet watx' chi aj can nachaj el yuj eb.</t>
6: <t>A juntzan k'anej ti', chi colwaj yin co naon el tzet c'uan el yin is k'anej eb jelan, c'al tzetbil yayji juntzan k'anej pural chi nachaj el juj.</t>
7: <t>A yichbanil acaw jelanilal, tol ayokab yelapnok Jehová yul co sat. A eb c'am is nabal, c'am chi yochej eb chi yi' is jelanil, c'al is cuybanil.</t>
8: <t>Ach in c'ajol, cha ab a cuybanil chi wala', cax manchak entaknej el a cuybanil chi yak' a txutx.</t>
9: <t>A yuj juntzan nabalej ti', ok watx'jok oc a beybal yuj, axca chi yun watx'ji aj eli yuj junok uej, ma yuj junok corona.</t>
10: <t>Ta a eb yobtakwom chi yochej chach montejtok yetok, manchak a cha abej.</t>
11: <t>Tekan ok yal eb ayach axca ti': Ocan jetok, yet watx' chon makwaj yulak be yet chi co mak'on cam junok anima chi ec' bay tu', caxc'al c'am is mul ayon.</t>
12: <t>Yul wal is cawil ok co mitx'oni, chi lajwi tu' ok co c'ayonxac'al elok.</t>
13: <t>Catatu' ok jioncan masanil pojanil beyomal, cax ok jak'on noj co na yuj masanil tzet yetal tol ok jelk'anej.</t>
14: <t>Sebach, ak' porobal a suerte jetok, ok jak'on et yin tzet yetal ok ji', ẍi mi eb.</t>
15: <t>Ach in c'ajol, manchak ach toj yetok eb; a ti et, tol najat chach el yul is be eb.</t>
16: <t>Yujtol yelc'ulal chi yak' eb yip yunen yobtakilal; toxac'al chi nanon eb yin mak'on cam anima.</t>
17: <t>Tok ay yopiso junok yal chi ayi, tatol chi yil no tz'iquin tu'.</t>
18: <t>A juntzan winak tu', is yalil eb chi yayok, ac'al oc eb chi mak'cam ba.</t>
19: <t>A junok elk'om, bak'in mi ok camok; axca tu' ok yun cam eb chi yochej chi oc beyomal yuj yobtakil chi yunej.</t>
20: <t>A bay yulak calle c'al bay chi jayoc be, a bay txonbal c'al tzanc'al bay chi wajbaj ba anima, chon yawtej Dios, yuj yak'on co nabal.</t>
22: <t>A wal ayex ti' ex ach'ej, ex tol c'amto e nabal, toc'al chex buchwaji: ¿bak'in wal ok e bek e camc'ulnen jun e c'am nabalil tu'? ¿bak'in ok e bekcan e buchwaji, c'al e yintaknen el ojtakbilal?</t>
23: <t>Chaek e yab bay ok ex in tenchanej, axca tu' ok yun wak'on in c'ulbal ayex; ok wak' e yojtaknej el in k'anej.</t>
24: <t>Ayin ti', chex wawtej, yet watx' chex tit ayin, palta c'am che yochej che cha e yabej.</t>
25: <t>Axa chi yunej, tol che yintaknejcan el tzet chi wala', cax c'am che cha e yab in tenchebal.</t>
26: <t>Axa ok yun xin, tol ok in tzewok e yin yet ok jayoc yatakilal e yiban. Toxac'al ok in buchwaj e yin yet ok ex camel yuj xiwilal.</t>
27: <t>A wal yet ok jayoc xiwc'ulal, yatakilal, bilc'ulal, c'al cusc'ulal e yiban, axcaxac'al junok cakxuchum cak'ek' tol chi yak' lajwok masanil, caywal tu' ok e yunej.</t>
28: <t>A yet jun c'ual tu', ok in e yawtej, palta manxa ok in tak'wok ayex; ok in e sayic'ok, palta manxa ok in ilchaj e yuj.</t>
29: <t>Yujtol che buchcan el jelanilal, c'am che yochej tol ay welapnok yul e sat.</t>
30: <t>C'am che yochej che cha e yab tzet chi wala', tol che yintaknejcan el tenchebal chi wak'a'.</t>
31: <t>Ok e yab yail yuj e beybal tu', toxac'al ok ex caktzaj aj yuj e yobtakil tu'.</t>
32: <t>A eb c'amto is nabal, ok cam eb yuj is c'am nabalil, ok lajwok ay eb yob nabal yuj c'am chi cha eb yabej.</t>
33: <t>A pax mac tol chi cha yab tzet chi wal xin, a jun tu' ok ayjok ec' yin junc'ulal, c'am bay ok xiwok, ẍi Cham.</t>
